先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦
还得绑战网，垃圾游戏

這個遊戲本來已經退出中國市場了，再下載steam版真是有夠蠢的，狗看了都搖頭，剛看了steam的商品詳情才發現原來這遊戲已經是5對5的玩法了，以前剛出來的時候還是6對6，不誇張地說這是我玩的第一款連線遊戲，當時在這裡真的認識不少一起玩的同好，優化不滿意也是一起罵開發者，玩的過程很開心，雖然後來都afk了，大家都有了各自的事業，但是偶而還是會打開當時猶存的中國服戰網，看看曾經玩過的ow，看看曾經20歲仍未接受社會毒打的自己，也惋惜當時那幾年暴雪越來越離譜的更新以及對新手和afk的老玩家的環境，ow已經不是最初16年時的樣子了，直到後來ow2上線，才又將其下載下來，新英雄kiriko我也很喜歡，但彼時ow2作為免費遊戲，無論玩法還是遊戲畫面都不是那麼讓人期待了，正好3個月後，中國服永久關閉了，對它最後的念想也沒有了，如今8個月後，再出現在我的steam首頁時，感覺這就是個陌生的遊戲，甚至不如apex吸引我，可能，這是在告訴我，我已經不是7年前的自己了，不要老是對過去的東西有執念，就應該狠狠地批判，不好就是不好，不要因為自己不喜歡給人差評而對其視而不見。而且我記得說會有PVE模式的時候正好那年我大學畢業，到現在過去5年了，就出了一個看起來沒什麼新意的內容，這也是我後來不再關注這遊戲的原因，以前士兵76的英雄短片有一幕“NOT ANYMORE”,現在我對OW的態度也是一樣，我也不再是 “英雄”了，也不再是永不消逝的了。

So I have at least 2500hr in overwatch.  only 80 in OW2, and most of that 80hr was in the closed and open betas.

This is not really overwatch 2.  it is overwatch 1, version two point suck.

it really sucks.  It sucks out loud.  It might as well be called overwatch: Hoover edition, since it sucks so much.

Nothing that was promised during development actually was delivered, and things we already had were taken away.  Balance was shot.  I could play with fewer friends (seriously I was not entirely happy with 6v6 having so few players, 5v5 was even worse).  They wanted to fix the 2-2-2 queue time issues, they could have buffed tanks, and gone for a 1-2-3 team comp, adding an extra DPS, and that would have fixed the problem.  The PvE CAMPAIGN still hasnt shown up, and it seems to never happen.

This is before we get into the monetization model Blizzard inflicted upon a once loyal and robust player base.

This new version of the game made me realize that loot crates are a viable and reliable means of monetizing a game beyond the initial point of sale, financing maintenance and content updates.  I can appreciate battle passes as a strategy, even if I don't like them.  The problem is how this game monetized.  you cannot buy a battle pass, and even playing 100hr of the game, getting all the daily and weekly challenges (which arent guaranteed) earn the next battle pass.  So you will have to shell out $45 a year just to get everything from battle passes, and then they stick playable characters, which are a key part of the game, behind a paywall.

All the skins, sprays, emotes, highlight intros, voice lines, and victory poses I got in the game, (bought a bunch of loot crates, plus the straight cash for special skins like midas roadhog or pirate bastion) over the three years I was playing, now cost over $5,000 if you were to buy all of them in the store, and you cannot get any of them for free any more.

The fact that what blizzard did to this game hurt the game so hard that it is dying should be a warning to stay away.  That damage is so severe that they actually brought it to Steam in order to try to revive it.  The user reviews are warranted.  And I will be removing this from my steam account now.

Go play TF2, the cosmetic system is far better, the loot crates are completely optional, and you can sell the goods you get to other players, or gift duplicates to new players.  The balance is better too.  Or if you really want something new, get yourself a copy of Starship Troopers: Extermination, or wait for Payday 3, or almost literally anything else other than this POS.

你说的对 但是《守望先锋2归来》是由动视暴雪自主研发的一款全新第一人称射击游戏。我现在每玩一周守望先锋都能赚60金币，每个月差不多240金币的收入，也就是现实生活中每个月7.2元的收入水平，换算过来31周，也就是7个月，我就可以买一个守望先锋的普通金皮，虽然守望先锋1只要1000金币升级还给箱子可以有几率开出，但是已经超越了中国绝大多数人(包括你)的水平，这便是守望先锋给我的骄傲的资本。ow没有义务给你你想得到的东西，他只是一款游戏,给你带来快乐，还要依着你的小脾气?他就算不让你玩，他也没有不对的地方，记住ow没欠你,也许我们大家还欠暴雪一句谢谢，暴雪花费大量精力和金钱制作的ow2，最后免费开放给玩家，你们居然还不知足，记住是我们选择的ow,不是ow选择的我们，觉得不好可以退游，暴雪、ow不欠我们,但是我们欠暴雪、ow一句谢谢，以及制作组两年多幸苦制作，而不是在这口诛笔伐问官方要补偿，如果你觉得我说的不对，一定是不懂2016夏天的含金量。
You're right, but 'Overwatch2 Returns' is a brand new first person shooter game independently developed by Activision Blizzard. I now earn 60 gold coins every week playing Overwatch2, with a monthly income of about 240 gold coins, which is the real life income level of 7.2 yuan per month. In 31 weeks, which is 7 months, I can buy an ordinary gold skin of Overwatch2. Although Watchman Pioneer 1 only needs 1000 gold coins to upgrade and return the box, it has a chance to open it, but it has surpassed the level of the vast majority of people in China (including you), This is the proud capital that Overwatch2 has given me. Overwatch has no obligation to give you what you want. It's just a game that brings you joy, but also relies on your small temper? Even if he doesn't let you play, there's nothing wrong with him. Remember, Overwatch doesn't owe you, maybe we all owe Blizzard a thank you. Blizzard spent a lot of effort and money creating Overwatch 2, which was finally released for free to players, but you're not satisfied. Remember, we chose Overwatch, not Overwatch. If you feel bad, you can quit the game. Blizzard and Overwatch don't owe us, but we owe Blizzard Overwatch, thank you, and the production team has been fortunate enough to work hard for over two years instead of verbally demanding compensation from the official. If you think what I said is wrong, you must not understand the value of the 2016 summer.

6 лет  и >1000 часов прошли очень быстро, я сменил множество соревновательных игр, но Overwatch навсегда останется в моем сердечке.

За все это время, овер прошел множество испытаний, но, принимая непростые решения, Blizzard делали игру все лучше и лучше. Даже сейчас, когда кипит негодование, я вижу как все изменилось с момента релиза в лучшую сторону. Студия продвигает игру вперёд, пытаясь создать нечто идеальное в противовес активижн, с ее ежегодным "обновлением" за 70$ (могу ошибаться в стоимости, но точно знаю, что я отдал 800 рублей за овер в 2017м году и проект для меня отбился с лихвой). Лично у меня, складывается впечатление, что ревью-бомбингом занимаются люди, которые даже если и запускали проект, то не выходили за рамки Хандзо/Вдовы. 

Что касается PvE, могу сказать что в нем абсолютно нет смысла. Аналогичный проект от Ubisoft по Rainbow Six Siege оказался мертворожденным, что, с большей вероятностью случилось бы и с их сюжеткой, а возможно, и вовсе похоронил бы основную игру.

Обобщенно говоря, с 2016го года вышло много шикарных игр, но если вы пропустили именно эту, установите, сформируйте свое мнение, не ведитесь на ревью-бомбинг.
